details.n: Skirt no Naka wa Kedamono Deshita.

ratings.en: Sorry. I can't hold back anymore
Wanna continue from where we left off last time?
So, this is me. How do you think?
I'm obsessed with you because I love you so much
I wanted you to look at me properly
You're the one who stirred things up
Let's go out for a date again
Such a waste. Should look more better
Can't give up. Won't give up.
I love you. I truly do love you.
